attributes.action: Hold a UK referendum on HUAWEI 5G being installed across the UK after pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: We must be allowed to have a voice in allowing the UK to have Huawei as our 5G provider. It’s a danger to national security.
attributes.background: The UK deserves a voice in allowing 5G Huawei networks going up across the country. There are reasonable doubts about the Security of our data, information and own national security information being taken by Huawei.
